pr_title: Adds CorrelationField to help simplify configuration of CorrelationScopeDecorator

timeline.message:
Adds CorrelationField to help simplify configuration of CorrelationScopeDecorator

CorrelationScopeDecorator was awkward before and would have required different
configuration frameworks to repeat what we did for spring-beans.
